Package sprite

Class Block

java.lang.Object
core.Shape
core.Rectangle
sprite.Sprite
sprite.Block
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bomb, Chest
public class Block extends Sprite
A tile inside a mine that, when mined, gives the player coins.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a block at (x, y) with dimensions width x height that is visually represented in the window by img.

  • Constructor Details

    • Block

      public Block(processing.core.PImage img, int x, int y, int width, int height, int health, int coinValue)
      Creates a block at (x, y) with dimensions width x height that is visually represented in the window by img. The number of hits it takes to break the block is set by health and coinValue determines how many coins the player will receive.
      Parameters:
      img - The image that visually represents the block in the window.
      x - The x-coordinate of the block in the window.
      y - The y-coordinate of the block in the window.
      width - The width of the block.
      height - The height of the block.
      health - The durability of the block that makes it take more hits to mine.
      coinValue - The number of coins the block will give the player when it is mined.
